name: @trustrails/dol-processor
description: DOL Form 5500 data processor for retirement plan search

scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy syncDOLData --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --region=us-central1 --memory=8GB --timeout=3600s --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --set-env-vars=NODE_ENV=production
scripts.deploy:scheduled: gcloud scheduler jobs create http dol-sync-monthly --location=us-central1 --schedule='0 2 2 * *' --uri=https://syncdoldata-xxxxx-uc.a.run.app --http-method=GET
